ing.item: Packag (16 oz) angel hair pasta; capellini
Box; (10 oz.) Birds Eye frozen Deluxe Broccoli Florets
Box; (10 oz.) Birds Eye frozen Cauliflower with Cheese Sauce

directions.step:
Pre-heat oven to 350Â°. Cook angel hair pasta according to package directions. Drain well. Combine pasta, oil and broccoli florets in 9 x 13 in. baking pan. Cover with cauliflower/cheese sauce mixture; bake for 20 minutes, or until heated through. Makes 4 servings. Prep Time: 10 minutes Cook Time: 20 minutes Calories-214, Protein-11gm, Carbohydrate-36gm Total Fat-4gm, Cholestrol-40mg, Fiber-3gm Sodium -261 mg MC formatting by bobbi744@acd.net ICQ #12099523
